name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics
display_help: You are a master at manipulating and transferring Kinetic energy. You can manipulate the potential energy found in objects to aid your allies or weaken your foes.

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Transfusion
powers.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Siphon_Power
powers.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing his damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -15.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on target

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Repel
powers.display_help: Repel creates a zone of kinetic energy that violently repels nearby foes. Each foe that is repelled costs additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 110.00% chance for 5.0 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Siphon_Speed
powers.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing his movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -50.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 1m 0s on target
-50.00% strength to jump height for 1m 0s on target
-20.00% strength to recharge for 1m 0s on target
20.00% strength to recharge for 1m 0s on self
-350.00% max run speed for 1m 0s on target

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Increase_Density
powers.display_help: Increases an ally's mass, freeing him from any Disorient, Immobilization, or Hold effects and leaving him resistant to such effects for a while. Increase Density also protects the target from Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleportation, as well as Smashing and Energy damage. Because the target grows more dense, their movement speed is Slowed. Although the Damage Resistance and slowing effect will not stack with multiple applications, the rest of the effects of Increase Density will. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 18.75% resistance to smashing damage, energy damage for 1m 0s on target
-7.8 hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection for 1m 0s on target
77.85% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun for 1m 0s on target
-8.0 knockup protection, repel protection for 1m 0s on target
-10.00% strength to jump height for 1m 0s on target
-10.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 1m 0s on target

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Speed_Boost
powers.display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 50.00% strength to recharge for 2m 0s on target
50.00% resistance to recharge debuff for 2m 0s on target
175.00% resistance to run speed debuff for 2m 0s on target
68.25% resistance to fly speed debuff for 2m 0s on target

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Inertial_Reduction
powers.display_help: You can reduce your Inertia, along with that of all nearby allies. The affected allies can then jump incredible distances for a while. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Transference
powers.display_help: Transference drains an enemy of some of their Endurance and transfers that Endurance to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transference to recover Endurance for yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Mastermind_Buff.Kinetics.Fulcrum_Shift
powers.display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, you, and those near you. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power you and your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a battle. Recharge: Slow
